title: Designing a Mathematics 4C Competency Enhancement Module for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing improvement of mathematical thinking for solving real-world job-related problems, designed around activities using learners' personal digital devices

learning_goals: One can design a mathematical problem-solving module by applying the ADDIE model-based CTL (Curriculum and Teaching Learning) approach.
One can construct a mathematics learning environment leveraging the 4C competencies (Creativity, Critical Thinking, Collaboration, Communication).
One can develop personalized mathematics activity materials to enhance learner motivation.
One can operate effective mathematics learning modules in a blended learning environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
